description: React component for the shopping cart page in an e-commerce sneaker platform, displaying cart items, subtotal calculation, and navigation actions.

methods.name: Cart()
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the shopping cart interface, managing cart state, subtotal calculation, and navigation.

methods.name: updateQty
methods.description: Updates the quantity of a specific cart item, ensuring minimum of 1.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes a cart item by its ID.

methods.name: goCheckout
methods.description: Navigates to the checkout page with cart items and subtotal passed via state.
